author: ralexstokes
content:
touched on an interaction b/t history expiry and how the CLs use deposit logs which suggests we need to block shipping mainnet history expiry until post-pectra

core summary is quoted in this comment: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1374#issuecomment-2741993183

author: ralexstokes
content: can cover in more depth on next week's ACD (and happy to clarify anything here in the meantime)
